long_description: A great travel item, this Outdoor Products Multi-Purpose poncho for women is easy to pull out of your bag and throw over your clothes and daypack for quick weather protection. Full-cut integral hood adjusts via a drawcord. Made with durable urethane-coated nylon taffeta, rustproof snaps and watertight bound seam construction. Includes a handy polyester ripstop zip carrying case. Poncho measures 54 in. wide x 40 in. long (not including hood) when it is being worn.
short_description: A great travel item, this Outdoor Products Multi-Purpose poncho for women is easy to pull out of your bag and throw over your clothes and daypack for quick weather protection.
